Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and expectations. Given its unique features and the high-quality materials used, we believe it's worth more than just its face value. Considering its exceptional performance and durability, I'm proposing a special introductory price of $18000 for you. This offer includes a comprehensive warranty and personalized support to ensure your complete satisfaction. Don't miss out on this opportunity to elevate your experience with our top-tier product. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $18,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $18,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
